text: Henry Whitworth Garden (23 August 1868–1949) was an Irish footballer who played in the Football League for Derby County. His only game for Derby came on the opening day of the 1892–93 season, a 3–1 victory against Stoke. ==References== Category:1868 births Category:1949 deaths Category:Irish association footballers (before 1923) Category:Association football defenders Category:English Football League players Category:Derby Midland F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Long Eaton Rangers F.C. players
title: Henry Garden
